data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Saint George Basseterre.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint George Basseterre, Saint Kitts and Nevis

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Saint George Basseterre, Saint Kitts and Nevis today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Saint George Basseterre, Saint Kitts and Nevis. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Saint George Basseterre, Saint Kitts and Nevis.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Saint George Basseterre to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Saint George Basseterre, Saint Kitts and Nevis.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Saint George Basseterre, Saint Kitts and Nevis honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.focus_label: Saint George Basseterre, Saint Kitts and Nevis
